net.proteusframework.ui.mcolumn

Interface MTableColumn

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractColumn, FixedValueColumn, PropertyColumn

    public interface MTableColumn
    Represents a MIWT table column.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Class<?> getColumnClass()
      Gets the type of data contained in the column.
      LocalizedText getColumnName()
      Gets the name of the column.
      LocalizedObjectKey getColumnNameKey()
      Gets the name of the column using a localized object key.
      Comparator<?> getComparator()
      Gets the comparator for sorting this column.
      String getDisplayClass()
      Get an optional display class.
      Metric getMaximumWidth()
      Gets the maximum width the column requires.
      Metric getMinimumWidth()
      Gets the minimum width the column requires.
      Object getValue(Object rowData)
      Gets the value for the column.
      boolean isValueEditable(Object rowData)
      Return true if the value is editable.
      void setValue(Object rowData, Object value)
      Set value.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        @Nullable
Object getValue(Object rowData)
        Gets the value for the column.
        Parameters:
        rowData - the row data.
        Returns:
        the value or null if no value is available for the specified data.

      • isValueEditable

        boolean isValueEditable(Object rowData)
        Return true if the value is editable.
        Parameters:
        rowData - the row data.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • setValue

        void setValue(Object rowData,
            Object value)
        Set value.
        Parameters:
        rowData - the row data.
        value - the value for the column.

      • getColumnClass

        Class<?> getColumnClass()
        Gets the type of data contained in the column.
        Returns:
        the type. Never null.

      • getColumnName

        LocalizedText getColumnName()
        Gets the name of the column.
        Returns:
        the name. Never null.

      • getColumnNameKey

        LocalizedObjectKey getColumnNameKey()
        Gets the name of the column using a localized object key.
        Returns:
        the name key. May be null. If null, getColumnName() is called.

      • getComparator

        Comparator<?> getComparator()
        Gets the comparator for sorting this column.
        Returns:
        the comparator.

      • getDisplayClass

        String getDisplayClass()
        Get an optional display class.
        Returns:
        the HTML class name or null.

      • getMaximumWidth

        Metric getMaximumWidth()
        Gets the maximum width the column requires.
        Returns:
        the width or null if not specified.

      • getMinimumWidth

        Metric getMinimumWidth()
        Gets the minimum width the column requires.
        Returns:
        the width or null if not specified.
